sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1387186_ows.createSatelliteTask</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>createSatelliteTask</name><script><![CDATA[var createSatelliteTask = Class.create();
createSatelliteTask.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	newTask: function(){
		var assignment = this.getParameter("assignedAgent");
		var grDist = new GlideRecord("x_1387186_ows_distance");
		grDist.addQuery("sys_id",assignment);
		grDist.query();
		grDist.next();

		//var gr = new GlideRecord("x_1387186_ows_satellite_task");
		//gr.initialize();
		//gr.assignment = assignment;
		//gr.location = grDist.satellite.location();
		//gr.insert();
		return JSON.stringify({"test":"test2"});
	},
    type: 'createSatelliteTask'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>gavin.moreland</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-18 13:59:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>a851b0fe933e4210df7e70aefaba1057</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>createSatelliteTask</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Operation Workflow System" source="x_1387186_ows">524fdce693360210df7e70aefaba10da</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Operation Workflow System">524fdce693360210df7e70aefaba10da</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a851b0fe933e4210df7e70aefaba1057</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>gavin.moreland</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-18 13:59:08</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
